# Semicolon separated values

separator = ';' -> ''
quote = ('"' | '\'')
tripleQuote = ('"""' | '\'\'\'')
quotedString = <(quote:q <(~exactly(q) anything)*> exactly(q))>
tripleQuotedString = <(tripleQuote:q <(~exactly(q) anything)*> exactly(q))>
text = <(~(separator|quote) anything)+>
value = <(text | tripleQuotedString | quotedString)+>
values = value:v (ws separator ws value)*:vs separator* -> [v] + vs
